feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
